character.name: Special Agent Oso
character.affiliation: UNIQUE (United Network of Intelligence and Quick Undercover Enforcement)
character.description: A lovable, yellow panda who works as a special agent, helping children complete tasks through 'three special steps' while learning problem-solving skills.

appearance.clothing: Black vest with UNIQUE badge, occasionally a green backpack
appearance.features: Round face, black eye patches, small black ears

skills: Using gadgets provided by Paw Pilot

gadgets.name: Paw Pilot
gadgets.description: A device that provides Oso with mission details and 'three special steps' to complete tasks

gadgets.name: Training Vest
gadgets.description: Equipped with tools and gadgets for missions

show.title: Special Agent Oso
show.premise: Oso helps children with everyday tasks by breaking them into three simple steps, often while completing his own training missions.
